entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 32 with temperature rising to minus 28 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 32 with temperature rising to minus 28 by morning. Wind chill minus 44 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 24.
